articles.content:

articles.title: Late Doncaster actress to appear as Vicar of Dibley returns for Christmas specials - Doncaster Free Press
articles.description: Late Doncaster actress Emma Chambers is set to feature as BBC comedy favourite The Vicar of Dibley returns for a number of festive specials this Christmas.
articles.content:
Comedienne Dawn French is reprising her role as Geraldine Granger for three lockdown specials of the much-loved comedy favourite.
And it has been announced that the episodes will pay tribute to Donc… [+1950 chars]
